title: Birth control - How?
creator_credit: Frank Slinglarn, Stuart Schulberg, Ted Yates and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Discusses “the pill” and other birth control methods, and describes controlled experiment groups in Kentucky and in Puerto Rico. Examines some of the moral dimensions of birth control.
creator_credit_for_label: Frank Slinglarn, Stuart Schulberg, Ted Yates and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
description: Discusses “the pill” and other birth control methods, and describes controlled experiment groups in Kentucky and in Puerto Rico. Examines some of the moral dimensions of birth control.
